traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The giant can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Battleaxe attacks and one Harpoon attack.

actions.name: Battleaxe
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6 damage) slashing damage, or 22 (3d10 + 6 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 7 (2d6 damage) cold damage.

actions.name: Harpoon
entries: Ranged atk +7 to hit, range 50/200 ft., one creature. 14 (2d10 + 3 damage) piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape DC 16). While the target is {@condition grappled} this way, its speed isn't reduced, but it can't move farther from the giant. The target takes 5 (1d10 damage) slashing damage if it escapes from the grapple or if it tries and fails. The giant can grapple only one target at a time with its harpoon.
